result.execSummary:
The defendant Louis W. Gordon was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Manuf/Deliver Schedule I, II Narcotics, a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: conditions of probation 6 months county jail starting 8-26-16 at 3pm, with credit for 5 days,  fine/costs including DNA Sample and Surcharge $1630.50 apply bond of $500.00  to fine/costs, Drug buy money reimbursement of $90.00 to LCO Police dept.   complete any counseling deemed appropriate by agent.    Def. to report to Probation & Parole today.

miscConds.notes: $1380.50   If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  Apply $500.00 bond after paying Drug Buy money reimbursement

$250.00   If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
complete any counseling deemed appropriate by agent
Def. must provide DNA sample and pay applicable $ 250 surcharge.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

supervisions.notes: 5 years prison - 2 years incarcerated 262 days credit time served

superMiscConds.notes: as previously ordered are converted to civil judgment

supervisions.notes: 5 years prison - 2 years incarcerated 262 days credit time served  and 3 years ES - Costs converted to civil judgment if unpaid- eligible for ERP

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Louis W. Gordon

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Louis W. Gordon in court with attorney Steven G. Richards.  Defendant Louis W. Gordon in custody.  Aaron B Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also 17 CF 309.  Global resolution reached.  15 CF 153 - 5 yrs prison - 2 years in and 3 yrs ES - 262 days credit time served - costs. 17 CF 309 count 1 - 3 yrs prison - 1 yr in and 2 yrs ES consecutive to 15 CF 153 - balance of counts are DRI.  State argues sentencing.  Atty Richards makes arguement.  

Court:  15 CF 153:  5 years prison - 2 years incarcerated 262 days credit time served  and 3 years ES - Costs converted to civil judgment if unpaid- eligible for ERP
Sentencing hearing on revocation on January 29, 2018 at 01:30 pm.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Louis W. Gordon in court with attorney Jesse Johansen.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State makes joint recommendation - Court on ct#1 withholds sentence 5 years probation, conditions of probation 6 months county jail starting 8-26-16 at 3pm, with credit for 5 days,  fine/costs including DNA Sample and Surcharge $1630.50 apply bond of $500.00  to fine/costs, Drug buy money reimbursement of $90.00 to LCO Police dept.   complete any counseling deemed appropriate by agent.    Def. to report to Probation & Parole today.
Sentencing hearing on June 28, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Louis W. Gordon in court with attorney Jesse Johansen.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Johansen requests sentencing be pushed out a couple months (with reason).  Defendant entered plea of NC.    DE advised of rights and penalties; DE waives rights; parties stipulate to facts.  Court finds defendant guilty.  Bail will continue.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 14, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Defendant Louis W. Gordon in court with attorney Jesse Johansen.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 12, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Louis W. Gordon in court, with attorney Jesse Johansen appearing by phone.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
DEF Acknowledges receipt of  Information.  Not Guilty plea entered.  Status conference scheduled for February 9, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Louis W. Gordon in court with attorney Jesse Johansen.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   3:29 PM  Court calls case and recites appearances.  Atty Johansen waived prelim.  Court advised the defendant as to his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant does not wish to have a prelim.  Court finds defendant has freely waived his right to a prelim - finds probable cause and binds defendant over for trial.  Bail will continue  Arraignment scheduled for January 5, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Louis W. Gordon in court with attorney Jesse Johansen.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin. have discovery - one more adjournment,  Scheduling conference scheduled for November 24, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Louis W. Gordon in court with attorney Jesse Johansen by phone.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 1 more scheduling  Scheduling conference scheduled for October 13, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Louis W. Gordon in court with attorney Jesse Johansen.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint.  DEF waives time limits for Preliminary Hearing.   Bond Continues.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 15, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Louis W. Gordon in court with attorney Martin Jarvis(Special Appearance).  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint, wishes to contact counsel.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 4, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Same appearances - Court questions defendant - recites pending charge.  Court advised the defendant as to his right to an attorney and the right to a preliminary exam w/i 10 days if in custody or 20 days if out of custody.  Defendant states he contacted the PD's office yesterday and does qualify.  Court INIT adjourned.  State requests cash bail of $5000.00

Defendant Louis W. Gordon in court and in custody.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  2:06 PM  Court calls case and recites appearances.  Initial appearance scheduled for July 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Louis W. Gordon in court, in custody appearing by video.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
DEF states he is unsatisfied with video and wishes to come over to court in person.  There is no time on the court calendar today.  Reset.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for July 16, 2015 at 01:15 pm.
